topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558b468463687261ea00011e#post_558b468463687261ea00011e
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558b442e6368726acd000952#post_558b442e6368726acd000952
I ain't touching this honestly. Seems like a touchy subject.
[/bq]
Not really; honestly it's one of those things that makes me want to slap certain users for cause we always talk about how cool it would be for in fiction for characters to have sexual interest in each other but the second it's canon people start yelling at each other saying it doesn't "deserve to exist".

Take for example Legend of Korra; if someone reading this is one of the people that shipped Korra and Asami then when it was canon you started complaining about it you deserve to get fucking slapped for that.


One of the few things I don't like about this forum summarized:
Person, "I want <insert character> to become sexually interested in <insert character>!"
*it actually becomes canon*
Same person, "Remove it!  It shouldn't be canon!"
